titles.title: Congratulating the winners of the Voice of Democracy national scholarship program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Ms. Hirono moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1170.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 384 - 0 (Roll no. 113).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 3/15/2010--Passed House without amendment. Congratulates the winners of the Voice of Democracy national scholarship program.
